name: VIA Global Health, Inc.
description: Operator of a medical supplies marketplace intended to connect medical distributors with affordable medical device manufacturers. The company provides access to difficult-to-source supplies that make it faster, easier, and more affordable to address points of friction that exist between buyers and sellers of medical products through e-catalog and supporting services like logistics, enabling healthcare equipment suppliers to connect with a network of verified local distributors.
